verbs.description: First lady Melania Trump [V: is] on Wednesday made her first public appearance in nearly a month . Speculation has swirled over her whereabouts .
[ARG0: First lady Melania Trump] is [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: made] [ARG1: her first public appearance in nearly a month] . [ARGM-ADV: Speculation has swirled over her whereabouts] .
